resources.string: Guess the number in FOUR tries.
Each guess can be a combination of any four numbers with NO repetitions
After each guess, the color of the tiles will change to show how close you were to guessing the right number
Here, the number 7 is the right digit at the right spot, and is highlighted green.
Here, the number 4 is the right digit at the wrong spot, and is highlighted blue.
The correct number has been guessed
